content.question: Which of the following best describes the impact of United Nations (UN) sanctions on Iran between 1987 and 2015 ?

choices.label: UN sanctions in Iran have taken a substantial economic toll, which has created domestic political turmoil.
UN sanctions in Iran have not been levied since the Iran-Iraq War, so there is no impact of the sanctions today.
UN sanctions in Iran have led to only conservative candidates being elected president in Iran.
UN sanctions in Iran have led to an opening, strengthening, and diversification of the Iranian economy.

content.answer: UN sanctions in Iran have taken a substantial economic toll, which has created domestic political turmoil.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
